Question
========
Mixed design ANOVAs:

Answerlist
----------
* Only include a mixture of within-group and repeated-measures variables.
* Require at least four independent variables.
* None of the other answers is correct
* Cannot combine repeated-measures and independent designs.

Solution
========





Mixed design ANOVAs contain a mixture of between- groups and repeated
measure variables, require at least two independent variables and can
combine repeated-measures and independent designs. Therefore none of the
answers is correct.
